events.message: Candidate John Doe submitted an application for the Software Engineer position, highlighting extensive experience in full-stack development and cloud systems.
The application was reviewed and categorised under Engineering due to keywords like software engineer, full-stack developer, and cloud infrastructure expertise.
Recruiter Jane Smith was assigned to coordinate the hiring process, as she specializes in recruiting engineering and software development talent.
Initial screening call with John went positively; candidate demonstrated strong technical knowledge and relevant project experience.
John promptly responded to the screening feedback, expressing eagerness to proceed with the technical interview and willingness to work remotely.
A technical interview was scheduled with the lead software engineer for 2024-05-05 at 10:00 AM UTC to further assess coding and system design skills.
